INSERT_TOWN: INSERT INTO $PREFIX$Towns (name, spawnDim, spawnX, spawnY, spawnZ, cameraYaw, cameraPitch, isAdminTown, extraBlocks, maxPlots, maxFarClaims) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT_BLOCK: INSERT INTO $PREFIX$Blocks (dim, x, z, isFarClaim, pricePaid, townName) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT_RESIDENT: INSERT INTO $PREFIX$Residents (uuid, name, joined, lastOnline, extraBlocks) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT_PLOT: INSERT INTO $PREFIX$Plots (name, dim, x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2, townName) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT_BLOCK_WHITELIST: INSERT INTO $PREFIX$BlockWhitelists(dim, x, y, z, flagName, townName) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT_BLOCK_OWNER: INSERT INTO $PREFIX$BlockOwners(resident, dim, x, y, z) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE_TOWN: UPDATE $PREFIX$Towns SET name=?, spawnDim=?, spawnX=?, spawnY=?, spawnZ=?, cameraYaw=?, cameraPitch=?, extraBlocks=?, maxPlots=?, maxFarClaims=? WHERE name=?
UPDATE_RESIDENT: UPDATE $PREFIX$Residents SET name=?, lastOnline=?, extraBlocks=? WHERE uuid=?
UPDATE_PLOT: UPDATE $PREFIX$Plots SET name=?, dim=?, x1=?, y1=?, z1=?, x2=?, y2=?, z2=? WHERE ID=?
UPDATE_PLOT_FLAG: UPDATE $PREFIX$PlotFlags SET serializedValue=? WHERE plotID=? AND name=?
UPDATE_TOWN_FLAG: UPDATE $PREFIX$TownFlags SET serializedValue=? WHERE townName=? AND name=?
UPDATE_RESIDENT_TO_TOWN: UPDATE $PREFIX$ResidentsToTowns SET rank = ? WHERE resident = ? AND town = ?
UPDATE_TOWN_TO_NATION: UPDATE $PREFIX$TownsToNations SET rank = ? WHERE town = ?, nation = ?
UPDATE_RESIDENT_TO_PLOT: UPDATE $PREFIX$ResidentsToPlots SET isOwner=? WHERE resident=? AND plotID=?
UPDATE_TOWN_BANK: UPDATE $PREFIX$TownBanks SET amount=?, daysNotPaid=? WHERE townName=?
DELETE_BLOCK: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$Blocks WHERE dim=? AND x=? AND z=?
DELETE_RANK: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$Ranks WHERE name=? AND townName=?
DELETE_TOWN_FLAG: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$TownFlags WHERE townName=? AND name=?
DELETE_PLOT_FLAG: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$PlotFlags WHERE plotID=? AND name=?
DELETE_BLOCK_OWNER: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$BlockOwners WHERE dim=? AND x=? AND y=? AND z=?
DELETE_RESIDENT_TO_TOWN: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$ResidentsToTowns WHERE resident = ? AND town = ?
DELETE_TOWN_TO_NATION: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$TownsToNations WHERE town = ? AND nation = ?
DELETE_RESIDENT_TO_PLOT: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$ResidentsToPlots WHERE resident=? AND plotID=?
DELETE_FRIEND: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$Friends WHERE resident1=? AND resident2=? OR resident1=? AND resident2=?
DELETE_FRIEND_REQUEST: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$FriendRequests WHERE resident=? AND residentTarget=?
DELETE_TOWN_INVITE: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$TownInvites WHERE resident=? AND townName=?
DELETE_TOWN_FLAG: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$TownFlags WHERE name=? AND townName=?
DELETE_PLOT_FLAG: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$PlotFlags WHERE name=? AND plotID=?
DELETE_RANK_PERM: DELETE FROM $PREFIX$RankPermissions WHERE node = ? AND rank = ?
